stories.text:
I want to learn medicine. Is there a book you can recommend that reads so simple anyone would understand?

I basically don't know anything about medicine and would like to learn it.
stories.title: Ask HN: Best “ELI5” book to learn medicine?

stories.text:
While there's another Scratch post on the front page, I thought I'd show off something that pushes Scratch to its limits.

It has no practical purpose, but it does go to show that (with the right tooling), you can do just about anything with Scratch.
stories.title: Show HN: Scratch Cryptography Library
